title: Movenet Lightning
long_description: MoveNet Lightning model is a lightweight human pose estimation model optimized for real-time performance on edge devices (RPI), specifically using the Lightning variant for speed. Built on a CenterNet architecture with a MobileNetV2 backbone and an FPN, it predicts the position and confidence scores of 17 human body keypoints.

links.label: GitHub
links.heading: Try Today
links.sub-heading: Deploy the pre-trained model to your PSOC™ Edge Eval Kit
